It‚Äôs been a great tool for helping me set the tone for the day. I like that I can swipe within a specific category to read affirmations that pertain to any topic. This app even has a quality where you can create your own affirmations and revisit them using the app‚Äôs fonts and wallpapers, which adds character and personality to each message.

data.title: Spy
data.content: Life has taught me that you can‚Äôt control someone‚Äôs loyalty. No matter how good you are to them ,it doesn‚Äôt mean that they will treat you the same way. I have been married to my husband for years with no idea he was cheating. Suddenly i started noticing changes in behavior, i suspected something was wrong So i confided in a friend who convinced and introduced me to an hacker. He was able to hack into my husband mobile phone to access his Text messages, Call logs, IG, browser history, deleted messages, Emails and WhatsApp remotely . It seemed as though my life was spinning out of control getting to find out he has someone else. I filed for a divorce just could not continue with his lies. If you feel you have been exploited in your marriage and you need proof. I suggest you contact Wayne Victor on his gmail and thank me later , he‚Äôs into any hacking related issues and can solve all hacking problem expertvictor05 @ gmail.com

data.title: Unacceptable
data.content:
I wanted to share some feedback about an affirmation that recently appeared in the app:

‚ÄúI know that ending this is the best thing for me, even if it hurts.‚Äù

While I understand the intention behind it, the wording ‚Äúending this‚Äù can be interpreted in unsafe or harmful ways, especially since many people who use affirmation and wellness apps may already be struggling with mental health challenges. The phrase is vague and could unintentionally be read as a reference to self harm rather than healthy endings.

I thought it had to be a joke when this came up. Please remove this from your generator.

data.title: A very informational review for a very lovable app.
data.content: I downloaded this app because a friend had it and she said it was free, (besides the in app purchases.) If you know me, (which you don‚Äôt) if there is a free app, I WILL GET IT! So I downloaded it and it has already helped me cope with guilt from when I was younger, stress/anxiety, bad mindsets and even mental blocks. Truly this app has helped me cope with myself and it helped show me that not everyone can be perfect or be the person they want to be, if you‚Äôre being yourself, that‚Äôs good enough. This app has changed me in the best way possible and if your reading this because your considering getting this app, I urge you to try it out. If you don‚Äôt love it, you don‚Äôt have to use it. If you love it (which you will) you should totally keep it. I hope this review was informational and I hope it convinced you to get this app. Hope you all have a positive, safe and beautiful day.

data.title: Lost favorites
data.content: They update the app almost daily in the App Store and I lost all of my 300 favorites in one of those updates. It‚Äôs definitely DEFINITELY not worth $150/lifetime if it cannot even save your favorites to a cloud server. I log in and it tells me I have no favorites or self written quotes. My dates that I saved them are all reset, and I can‚Äôt add a quote to favorites from a notification without opening the app anymore.

data.title: Cancelled & still charged yearly subscription and Apple won‚Äôt refund
